betterquesting:10.desc:8:
This is the begining of the tech tree. Before proceeding it is recommended that you stock up on materials such as §6Iron§r, §6Coal§r, §6Copper§r and §6Redstone§r.

§a§2Some advanced machinery can be obtained by salvaging them from structures scattered across the world, such as Centrifuges from abandoned nuclear powerplants found in deserts, or by rare mob drops such as a Geiger Counter.

For those who want more of a challenge, Expensive mode can be enabled in the hbm.cfg file. Progression will be slightly changed due to new components.

Martian Mode is also available in the world creation screen.
